entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023
